text: Æþelweard cyð Ceolbrehte, þæt ic wille, þæt þu agife þa twegen dælas þære teoðunge from Bedewindan & fram Lamburnan þam godes þeowum to fostre æt Bedewindan.
And hie hit dælen betweoh him swa ðe gemetlic þynce: <hæn>.
Þyses gegildes gerædnes is, gif hyrra hwylcum <foretsit> gebyrige, begyte ælce uif mæssan oððe fif salteras for þa saule.
And æt þam þritigeþan dæge twegen & twegen uif lhafas & an penigweorð sufles swylces he begyttan mæge & æt hyrra mittingge sceotan twegen & twegen anne pennig for hyra sawle.
And æt husbryne twegen & twegen foþor timbres & ðæt bewyrcen oþþe twegen peniggas.
And þan <mæssepreosþe> on gagdagas sceotan twa gesamhiwan an geogscep oþþe twegen peniggas.
And gif hwa his gildan gelihinie oþþe gefyxse on his gildsetle gebete mid fif ambbreon ealaþ & mid þri.

Her cyþ þæt Eadwine geuþe Wynsige & Aþelnoþe his men, þæt he moste adon Byrhtgyþe ut of þam geburlande mid tyn mancusson færfrige on ælc land, þa Ælfsige folgaþ hæfde, & Wynstan wæs his gingra, on hyra gewitnesse, & on Ælfhehes mæssepreostes & on Æþeldryþe þære nunnan & on Titsiges & on Tætiges & on ealra þara godes þeowa æt Bedewindan, & on Ceolbyrhtes suna gewitnesse Sigestanes & Æþelstanes & on ealles þæs folces.

Þis is Ecgwynnes gewitnes, þæt Eadwine hyre geuþe, þæt heo hy moste adon ut of þam geburlande færfrige on ælc land mid tyn mancusson seolfres, þa Ælfsige folgaþ hæfde & Wynstan wæs his geongra, on hyra gewitnesse & on Ælfhehes mæssepreostes & on ealra þara Godes þeowa æt Bedewindan & on ealles þæs folces.
